languages.text: "Умный образец. Да, мы — лжецы, и ты снова окажешься под ножом. Но если ты положишь оружие, я его хотя бы наточу".
"Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."
languages.original_text: "Умный образец. Да, мы — лжецы, и ты снова окажешься под ножом. Но если ты положишь оружие, я его хотя бы наточу".

traits.locale_text: "Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen it."
"Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen it."
"Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."
"Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."
"Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."

languages.text: “真是个聪明的实验对象。没错，我们都是骗子，你又该手术了。不过，如果你放下武器的话，我至少会把刀子磨得锋利些。”
languages.original_text: "Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."

traits.locale_text: “真是个聪明的实验样本。没错，我们都是骗子，你又该手术了。不过，如果你放下武器的话，我至少会把刀子磨得锋利些。”

languages.text: 「賢いサンプルだ。ああ、我々は嘘つきだ。そして君は再び手術を受ける。しかし君が武器を置けば、まず刃の研磨くらいはしてやろう」
languages.original_text: "Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."

traits.locale_text: 「賢いサンプルだ。ああ、我々は嘘つきだ。そして君は再び手術を受ける。しかし君が武器を置けば、まず刃の研磨くらいはしてやろう」

languages.text: « Ce spécimen est malin. Oui, nous sommes des menteurs, tu vas encore te faire charcuter. Mais si tu poses cette arme, j'aiguiserai d'abord le scalpel. »
languages.original_text: "Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."

traits.locale_text: « Ce spécimen est malin. Oui, nous sommes des menteurs, tu vas encore te faire charcuter. Mais si tu poses cette arme, j'aiguiserai d'abord le scalpel. »

languages.text: «Un espécimen astuto. Sí, somos mentirosos y vamos a operarte otra vez, pero si sueltas el arma, al menos afilaré la hoja antes».
languages.original_text: "Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."

traits.locale_text: «Un espécimen astuto. Sí, somos mentirosos y vamos a operarte otra vez, pero si sueltas el arma, al menos afilaré la hoja antes».

languages.text: "Kluges Exemplar. Ja, wir sind Lügner, und Ihr kommt wieder unters Messer. Aber wenn Ihr die Waffe weglegt, schärfe ich es vorher vielleicht."
languages.original_text: "Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."

traits.locale_text: "Kluges Exemplar. Ja, wir sind Lügner, und Ihr kommt wieder unters Messer. Aber wenn Ihr die Waffe weglegt, schärfe ich es vorher vielleicht."

languages.text: "Akıllı yaratık. Evet, yalancıyız. Seni bıçak altına yatıracağız. Fakat silahını bırakırsan en azından önce bıçağı bileriz."
languages.original_text: "Clever specimen. Yes, we are liars, and you are going back under the knife. But if you put the weapon down, I will at least sharpen the blade first."

traits.locale_text: "Akıllı yaratık. Evet, yalancıyız. Seni bıçak altına yatıracağız. Ama silahını bırakırsan en azından önce bıçağı bileriz."
